titles.title: Permitting official photographs of the House of Representatives to be taken while the House is in actual session on March 12, 2003.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Mica moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 67.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

reference.label: text of measure as passed House

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/12/2003--Introduced. Allows official photographs of the House to be taken on March 12, 2003, while the House is in actual session.Authorizes payment for associated costs to be made from the applicable accounts of the House of Representatives.
